mapper.select: select ABNAME, PROJECTNAME, CLASSGROUP, CREATDATE from MY."AddressBookTable" where (CLASSGROUP = #{classGroup} or #{classGroup } = '' or #{classGroup} is null) and (ABNAME= #{abName} or #{abName} = '' or #{abName } is null) and (REGISTERNAME = #{registerName} or #{registerName } = '' or #{registerName} is null)
select ABNAME, PROJECTNAME, CLASSGROUP, CREATDATE from MY."AddressBookTable"
